column2: Welcome to Zend MVC demo app
Welcome to Zend MVC demo app

Welcome to our demo Zend framework presnetation. The  purpose of this app is to showcase capabilites and ease of implementation of current web 3.0 trends using Zend Framework. Some of the feature you my find is internationalization, layout swapping, autocmplete, url translation, dynamic menu creation, dynamic grids and many more. The source can be found at
